title: Cant request a ticket
body: So I tried to send a ticket to Riot Games Support but everytime that I do, it tells me, "Request is not found. You do not have access to request #0. It may have been solved or deleted." The help I was looking for was not solved, and I have been filling out the ticket completely, it just apparently wont send. Any help?

replies.body: You'll need to be logged into the ticket center with the specific account to send and review your ticket.  If you still have any issues, though, don't worry!  Just send us an email via support@riotgames.com.  We'll get back to you via email!
Thanks, I just sent in an email now. I hope it gets reviewed. Thanks for the help!
